source_text: A 1% net smelter return (NSR) royalty on all minerals extracted from the tenement area, as governed by a Royalty Deed to be entered into at completion.
additional_details: The royalty is on all minerals extracted from the tenement area. It is a term of the Sale Agreement where Trigg Minerals Limited acquires the Achilles Antimony Project from Anchor Resources Pty Limited. Therefore, Trigg Minerals Limited (the acquirer/operator) will pay the royalty, and Anchor Resources Pty Limited (the vendor) will receive it.
